thread.title: Matt Ryan thanks Falcons fans in a sincere video
thread.title_full: Matt Ryan thanks Falcons fans in a sincere video

title: Matt Ryan thanks Falcons fans in a sincere video
text:
Matt Ryan thanks Falcons fans in a sincere video "I look forward to rising up next year." Post to Facebook Matt Ryan thanks Falcons fans in a sincere video "I look forward to rising up next year."  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/matt-ryan-thanks-atlanta-falcons-fans-video-super-bowl-51-loss/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Matt Ryan thanks Falcons fans in a sincere video Andrew Joseph 8:12 p.m. ET Feb. 9, 2017 
Matt Ryan #2 of the Atlanta Falcons speaks with the media during a press conference after losing 34-28 to the New England Patriots in Super Bowl 51 at NRG Stadium on February 5, 2017 in Houston, Texas. (Photo: Getty Images) 
The disappointment from the Falcons' Super Bowl collapse won't go away any time soon for Atlanta fans and players. But Matt Ryan isn't hiding from the spotlight after the loss. He's looking ahead to next season. 
On Thursday, Ryan posted a video from his home and thanked Falcons fans for all the support throughout the season. He looked forward to a move into Mercedes-Benz Stadium and urged Atlanta fans to support the other local teams. â€” Matt Ryan (@M_Ryan02) February 9, 2017 
This wasn't the first time Ryan had reached out to Atlanta fans on social media since the Super Bowl either. On Monday, Ryan posted an inspirational message to Instagram . 
It's safe to say that he's already looking forward to bounce back from that loss. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/matt-ryan-thanks-atlanta-falcons-fans-video-super-bowl-51-loss/ Most Popular
